Question: Stephen William ****, CH, CBE, FRS, FRSA (born 8 January 1942) is a British theoretical physicist, cosmologist, and author.
Hints: This person's first book The Large Scale Structure of Space-Time written with George Ellis was published in 1973.
This person's marriage had been strained for many years.
Although at school he was known as "Einstein", this person was not initially successful academically.
